posts.subject: So... how do we spread this board
posts.body:
First of all, hello frens !
Now that I managed to go on this website : how do we get new recruits ?
Most people are skeptical because of cp, and because it may not help us "that much". but I think it could be a great alternative to 4chan and its bot issues.

Any tactics or way to spread this board.

Well hello frendos !
Can you see me ?

posts.subject: Hello
posts.body:
Well hi you faggots.
Hope you aren't some tranny shills.

>>ddd96877-7dc0-4a47-b885-bf6f3d57e545
>>c5e01f44-af50-4b92-9eb0-7534c889cc6d
I may have an idea : we just tell people about decentralization through memes. It may look forced, but it'll work. And if we just meme decentralization, without talking about millchan (or other alternatives) people will either find alternatives by themselves, or be more attracted by millchan if we ever talk about it.

>>23bed5e9-a99e-4f81-b337-53b7fdf9d9a9
If you can attract them, the do it, kind sir. I don't use fediver and i am not familiar with any of the community.
